content: button start with white yarn note this part is not worked in a spiral but uses slip stitches to join rounds foundation ch2 does not count as a stitch 10 half_double_crochet magic_ring slip_stitch to first stitch of round invisible fasten_off © akabekobotan 2023 round 1 join black yarn to any stitch slip_stitch to end slip_stitch to first stitch of round break yarn fasten_off leaving a long tail 10 st assembly working in the loops of the foundation ring sew the button to the body over the jog where colour changes have occurred weave in all ends b premier ball proceed as with the poké ball except start the body with white yarn substitute all black yarn with red yarn c great ball proceed as with the poké ball except start the body with blue yarn stripes make 2 use red yarn row 1 chain 16 and working into the back of the foundation chain insert hook in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet to end fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing up 14 st assembly working from the front to the back sew each stripe to the body between round 5 and round 10 starting about 2 stitches from the button as shown weave in all ends © akabekobotan 2023 d ultra ball proceed as with the poké ball except start the body with dark grey yarn vertical stripes make 2 use yellow yarn row 1 chain 22 and working into the back of the foundation chain insert hook in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet to end fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing up 20 st assembly sew the vertical stripes to either side of the body abut one stitch away from the button as shown it may be easier to start front to back from the inner side of each stripe before sewing the outer margins sew the horizontal shorter stripe to the top of the body between the vertical stripes weave in all ends e master ball proceed as with the poké ball except start the body with purple yarn patches make 2 use pink yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 2dc in each st 12 st round 2 *2dc in 1 st double_crochet* repeat ** to end 18 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing up assembly sew each patch to the body opposite to each other between round 3 and round 9 on the left and right sides as shown on the next page © akabekobotan 2023 with white yarn embroider an m onto the front of the body using whipped backstitch just above the button weave in all ends thank you
